ModMetaData.name: MoHAR hediffs src
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Adds hediffs for humanlike beings.
- Make immune to (x) hediffs based on their HediffDef, (y) times or forever - Make a pawn a spawner of animals or materials - Destroy (x) hediffs based on their HediffDef or on a HediffDef.defName pattern, then apply 1 hediff on a bodyPart - make the pawn puff some steam
To test : - Use dev mode; Spawn pawn; choose a Mohar pawnkind - Use the scenario
Mod creators: The mod comes with ressources to allow some fast tests : - Textures - Xml hediff - Xml backstories - Xml race definition - Xml scenario definitions - Xml faction definitions - Xml pawnkind definitions
To allow your pawns to use these hediffs, you only need : - Dll in your mod assembly directory - Xml hediff definitions - A way to give your race the hediff. I used backstories but there are other ways.
